attributes.action: In Education Instill Respect in the Children from Five upwards, Lacking Today
attributes.additional_details:
The Children are Lacking Any Respect with some Attacking and Swearing at Teachers, Cheek the Police and All in Authority, No Respect for the Elderly who should be Respected, if it was Taught from an Early age it should stay with them in Adulthood and the Country a Better place to Live without Gangs Frightening their Neighbourhood.

Let’s try to make the Country a Better Place All round.
attributes.background: There are far to many children Lacking Any Respect today, they Abuse Teachers, The Police, and Public alike, I had it instilled in me and so Respected All Adults, never entered my class mates and me to Disrespect the Elderly and All above, when they leave School today it is Getting Worse today.
